categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic installations
Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic intelligence organizations

nodes.text: Watercrest Outpost served as a resort named Cliffview on the planet Reyniu. The trade died off during the Clone Wars, and the Rebel Alliance later turned it into an Alliance Intelligence base. The staff allowed limited outsiders into the resort as part of the charade, but discouraged repeat visits.
Watercrest Outpost was listed as an example of a Rebel base in Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook.
